blogPost.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
blogPost.body: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
blogPost.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds
blogPost.author: Howie Young

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能将视频通话和调度功能融入到您的服务中。Wondercall 2.0是更强大的嵌入式视频通话系统的任何网站和应用程序。现在，您不仅可以拨打电话，还可以安排他们。和方式来检查所有参与
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将视频呼叫和调度程序添加到任何服务中。

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能將視頻通話和調度功能融入到您的服務中。Wondercall 2.0是更強大的嵌入式視頻通話系統的任何網站和應用程序。現在，您不僅可以撥打電話，還可以安排他們。和方式來檢查所有參與
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將視頻呼叫和調度程序添加到任何服務中。

previous.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
previous.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.

localize.description: 关掉。慢下来。Sundayy是基于心灵的社交网络，设计为每周只需检查一次。Sundayy代表着花时间远离feeds，深入思考我们的日子，并与重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每周都要检查一次的社交网络，在周日。

localize.description: 關掉。慢下來。Sundayy是基於心靈的社交網絡，設計爲每週只需檢查一次。Sundayy代表着花時間遠離feeds，深入思考我們的日子，並與重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每週都要檢查一次的社交網絡，在週日。
